page.title: 11ASHOVER CHURCH
page.content: Paul Gordan Norman is the canon of Ashover church and he lives on Narrowleys Lane,Ashover.Ashover church is a Church of England church.The church has a magazine called the APM (Ashover Parish Magazine).The church has a plate on the wall with the history of the names of the priests on it.When you go to church for Harvest Festivals,the brownies and guides sometimes are there.Church services are held on Sundays at the following times; 8am Holy Communion, 10.30am Parish Communion,3pm Evening Song.The church has a tomb with 2 people in it and a brass eagle.
